review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How much effort did you engage in yesterday to practice “presence\"? If you followed
            through, congratulations and congratulate yourself. If you didn’t, ask yourself how much you are willing to
            commit to be resilient and successful. See you on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Pushing through to reach higher levels. Most are not born with determination; you develop it through hard
            work (Pillars #1 & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
"When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on." -Franklin D. RooseveltI see two important take-aways from what our 32nd president said in this statement. The first is that when
            you are on your last breath, you find your second breath. The other is a sense of determination. A
            determination to push through, to reach inside for untapped strength and resilience. I’d like to focus on
            this latter concept as it implies a methodology for developing strength.

action_step:
Where in your life would additional determination make a difference? Like the weightlifter who, when he or
            she can’t do another rep, finds the inner strength to do one or two more. It is in that extra effort that
            change occurs. Where can you engage in an extra effort? Where have you stopped short? Take some action today
            where you push yourself, and then appreciate your effort.
journal_entry: Write about your history of determination: where you have done so, and where you have not.
